import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Breadcrumb from '../common/breadcrumb'; import { getCartTotal } from '../../services'; import { removeFromCart, incrementQty, decrementQty } from '../../actions'; class Cart extends Component { render() { const { cartItems, symbol, total } = this.props; //debugger; return (

{cartItems.map((item, index) => { return ( ) })}

{item.prices.currency_symbol} {item.prices.sale_price}

this.props.removeFromCart(item)} >

) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ cartItems: state.cartList.cart, symbol: state.data.symbol, total: getCartTotal(state.cartList.cart) }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { removeFromCart, incrementQty, decrementQty })(Cart)
